'''Flowing Fog, Spritely Shadows''' is [[Ororon]]'s [[Night Realm's Gift Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Using Aiming Mode mid-air consumes '''2.5''' Phlogiston or '''20''' Stamina per second.
* For the duration which Ororon glows after using his high jump, he is considered to be in the [[Nightsoul's Blessing]] state.
